title: Game Jackal 3.2
description:
I use this program and it works awesome! It basically records while disc is loading. Let me give you the quick and easy steps.

1. Do NOT put game in drive until it tells you to.
2. Once you pick game from pull down menu select next, keep pressing next until you get to step 5.
3. Only have "Use Quick Launch" checked.
4. Put game in and it will start game, play online in any server for about 1 minute then exit game.
5. Once it is done saving profile then you can launch game without disc in drive by clicking Game Jackal shortcut.

Information below:

Game Jackal is a powerful "must have" utility for the PC gamer, allowing you to play all your favorite games without inserting the original CD-ROM. 

Game Jackal achieves this without modifying any part of the game installed on your computer, nor does it create large image files that require a virtual drive. It provides you with the ability to go "cd free" in minutesÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ And the best thing of all, Game Jackal creates your game profiles while you are playing your favorite games. 

Getting started with Game Jackal is easy using the profile wizard, all you need to do is 

Select "Create a profile" from the tools section of the Game Jackal interface. 
Enter a name for your new profile 
Select the game executable 
Insert the games's CD-ROM 
Play your game! 

After these initial steps your profile is all set up. The next time you want to play that game you simply select it from the list of available profiles. 

Includes .reg file to register it. Even works with DVD games.
Enjoy!
